name: api-check
description: Validate the api to your functions to help people use them correctly. This is pretty much React's propTypes without React.

scripts.watch: ./node_modules/wr/bin/wr -c 0 "npm run build" src/apiCheck.js src/apiCheckUtil.js src/checkers.js src/index.js
scripts.dev: npm run test:watch & npm run watch
scripts.build: npm run build:dist & npm run build:prod
scripts.ci: npm run code-checks && npm run test && npm run coverage && npm run check-coverage && npm run build
scripts.coverage: npm run code-checks && ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- src/index.test.js --compilers js:babel/register
scripts.code-checks: npm run only-check && npm run console-check
scripts.release: git push && npm publish && git push --tags
